dcterms:creator: R. Qi
X. Chi
L. Zhao
W. Yang
dcterms:description: This dataset includes martingales-based ALOHA-type grant-free access algorithms designed for multi-channel networks accommodating both mMTC and URLLC terminals.
dcterms:title: Grant-free ALOHA

dcterms:creator: J. Jiao
L. Xu
S. Wu
Y. Wang
R. Lu
Q. Zhang
dcterms:description: This dataset pertains to an unequal access latency random access protocol specifically designed for massive machine-type communications.
dcterms:title: Unequal access latency random access protocol

dcterms:creator: Y. Cui
S. Li
W. Zhang
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on jointly sparse signal recovery and support recovery using deep learning techniques, with applications in MIMO-based grant-free random access.
dcterms:title: Sparse signal recovery

dcterms:creator: A. H. Bui
C. T. Nguyen
T. C. Thang
A. T. Pham
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a comprehensive distributed queue-based random access framework tailored for mMTC in LTE/LTE-A networks, accommodating mixed-type traffic.
dcterms:title: Distributed queue-based random access framework

dcterms:creator: Z. Su
M. Dai
Q. Xu
R. Li
S. Fu
dcterms:description: This dataset involves Q-learning-based spectrum access strategies for content delivery in mobile networks.
dcterms:title: Q-learning-based spectrum access

dcterms:creator: S. K. Sharma
X. Wang
dcterms:description: This dataset covers collaborative distributed Q-learning techniques aimed at minimizing RACH congestion in cellular IoT networks.
dcterms:title: Collaborative distributed Q-learning
